t: Swim Tether - Endless Swim and Row Exercise in pools and swim spas
s: A swim tether is a versatile piece of equipment designed to let you swim in place, no matter the size of your pool. It’s typically made up of a flexible cord that attaches securely to a fixed point, like a pool deck or ladder, with the other end fitting comfortably around your waist. Swimming against the resistance of the cord mimics the feel of open water and helps improve strength and endurance. ... Great sturdy rubber band, I used another brand ...
